original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes stable at 327.00/30 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 327.00/30 to the US dollar on Monday, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.40/60 percent from 13.45/60 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed stable at 14.05/15 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 14.00/10 percent from 14.10/25 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.20/30 percent from 14.20/35 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.25/40 percent, from 14.20/35 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed at 14.30/45 percent, from 14.30/40 percent. (Colombo/Dec11/2023)
